participant_1.name: Chloe
participant_1.personality: Chloe is fun-loving and energetic, always ready to explore new music and dive into the latest video game releases.
participant_1.background: my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games.

participant_2.name: Maria
participant_2.personality: Maria is nurturing and optimistic, embracing the challenges of motherhood and making the most of her new life in a different country.
participant_2.background: i just moved into my first home. i'm expecting triplets in three months. i work at a school. i recently moved to this country. a already have a step children.
